section.name: Preparatory Material and General Course Information
section.summary: This section contains the course outline and other material that you will need at the very beginning of the course as you are getting oriented.  Note, this is not optional.  There is a required Getting to Know You survey, Lesson #0, and Quiz #0 which you will find here which you must complete.  Before you start the survey or Lesson #0 I strongly suggest that you open the course outline in another browser tab.  To do this  (on a computer - it is possible on a phone but more awkward), right click on one of the links to the course outline and then from the drop down menu choose "Open link in new tab".
